name: Quiplash
descr: 关于这款游戏For 3-8 Players and an Audience of thousands!The team behind the hit party games YOU DON’T KNOW JACK, Fibbage, and Drawful presents Quiplash, the laugh-a-minute battle of wits and wittiness! Use your phone or tablet to answer simple prompts like “Something you’d be surprised to see a donkey do” or “The worst soup flavor: Cream of _____.”No rules, no correct answers! Say whatever you want!Your answer is pitted against another player’s answer in a head-to-head clash of cleverness and comedy (or just “Which answer is least stupid?”). Other players – and even an Audience of people waiting to get in the next game – then vote for their favorite answer.Quiplash is a go-to party game that everyone can play and enjoy!NOTE: This game is a same-room multiplayer party game.NOTE: This game is in English only.
detail:
名称: Quiplash
类型: 休闲, 独立, 策略
开发商: Jackbox Games, Inc.
发行商: Jackbox Games, Inc.
发行日期: 2015 年 6 月 30 日
review: 全部评测: 特别好评 (938) - 此游戏的 938 篇用户评测中有 93% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (938 篇中的 93%) 发布至今
